des: "Maple flavored frosting that tastes great on the Maple Nut Cake or try it on a plain yellow or chocolate cake, yummy!  Increase the amount of maple extract (gradually!) to suit your taste."
ins: Beat the butter or margarine, confectioner's sugar, milk, and maple flavoring in a bowl until smooth. Add more milk or confectioner's sugar as need.  Makes enough to frost one 8 or 9 inch round cake or 1 8x8 inch square cake.
